summary.span: 使用繪圖命令描述幾何。

summary.span: 這個類別是與 類別搭配使用，用以建立不支援資料繫結、動畫或修改的輕量幾何。

span.span: This class is used with the class to create a lightweight geometry that does not support data binding, animation, or modification.

abstract member ArcTo : System.Windows.Point * System.Windows.Size * double * bool * System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection * bool * bool -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: streamGeometryContext.ArcTo (point, size, rotationAngle, isLargeArc, sweepDirection, isStroked, isSmoothJoin)

param.name: point
param.span: 弧形結尾的目的點。

span.span: The destination point for the end of the arc.

param.name: size
param.span: 其圓周用來繪製角度之橢圓形的半徑 (寬度的一半和高度的一半)。

span.span: The radii (half the width and half the height) of an oval whose perimeter is used to draw the angle.

param.span: 如果橢圓形的四週都是圓的，則弧形也會是圓的，而如果是幾近平面，則弧形也會幾近平面。例如，極大寬度和高度的值表示橢圓形會很大，這樣角度的曲率就會比較小。

span.span: If the oval is very rounded in all directions, the arc will be rounded, if it is nearly flat, so will the arc. For example, a very large width and height would represent a very large oval, which would give a slight curvature for the angle.

param.name: rotationAngle
param.span: 指定曲線之橢圓形的旋轉角度。

span.span: The rotation angle of the oval that specifies the curve.

param.span: 而弧形曲率可以利用這個參數進行旋轉。

span.span: The curvature of the arc can be rotated with this parameter.

param.name: isLargeArc
param.span: 表示繪製大於 180 度的弧度，否則為 。

span.span: to draw the arc greater than 180 degrees; otherwise, .

param.name: sweepDirection
param.span: 值，表示是以 或 方向繪製弧形。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the arc is drawn in the or direction.

param.name: isStroked
param.span: 使用 轉譯區段，將區段劃上底線時，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to make the segment stroked when a is used to render the segment; otherwise, .

param.name: isSmoothJoin
param.span: 使用 畫底線時，將這個區段和前一個區段之間的這個聯結視為邊角，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to treat the join between this segment and the previous segment as a corner when stroked with a ; otherwise, .
Draws an arc to the specified point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會使用上一個區段的結束點做為起點。This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point. 如果這是在圖形中的第一個區段，它會使用指定的點方法為其開始點。If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the method as its start point. A無法序列化，如果它包含或任何非圖案或直線線段。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何繪製弧線使用方法。The following example shows how to draw an arc using the method. Public MustOverride Sub BeginFigure (startPoint As Point, isFilled As Boolean, isClosed As Boolean)

abstract member BeginFigure : System.Windows.Point * bool * bool -> unit

param.name: startPoint
param.span: 圖片開始的 。

span.span: The where the figure begins.

param.name: isFilled
param.span: 使用這個圖形所包含的區域來進行點擊測試、呈現和裁剪；否則為 。

span.span: to use the area contained by this figure for hit-testing, rendering, and clipping; otherwise, .

param.name: isClosed
param.span: 表示關閉圖形；否則為 。

span.span: to close the figure; otherwise, .

param.span: 例如，如果繪製兩條連接的線條，而且 isClosed 設定為 ，則繪圖只是兩條線；但是，如果 isClosed 設定為 ，則會將兩條線封起來，以建立三角形。

span.span: For example, if two connecting lines are drawn, and isClosed is set to , the drawing will just be of two lines but if isClosed is set to , the two lines will be closed to create a triangle.
Specifies the starting point for a new figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由呼叫這個方法多次，您可以建立多個圖表 （自封式幾何圖形），在這個。By calling this method multiple times, you can create multiple figures (self-contained geometric shapes) within this . A無法序列化，如果它包含或任何非圖案或直線線段。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments.

summary.span: 繪製貝茲曲線至指定的點。

span.span: Draws a Bezier curve to the specified point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 起點、 結束點和兩個控制點所定義的三次方貝茲曲線。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, end point, and two control points. 第一個控制點會決定區段中，年上半年的曲率，第二個控制點會決定區段的第二個部分的曲率。The first control point determines the curvature of the first half of the segment, and the second control point determines the curvature of the second half of the segment. 此方法會使用上一個區段的結束點做為起點。This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point. 如果這是在圖形中的第一個區段，它會使用指定的點方法為其開始點。If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the method as its start point. A無法序列化，如果它包含或任何非圖案或直線線段。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何繪製貝茲曲線 using方法。The following example shows how to draw a Bezier curve using the method. [!code-csharp[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#StreamGeometryBezierToExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/StreamGeometryBezierToExample.cs#streamgeometrybeziertoexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#StreamGeometryBezierToExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/streamgeometrybeziertoexample.vb#streamgeometrybeziertoexamplewholepage)]

summary.span: 關閉這個內容，並清除它的內容，以進行轉譯。

span.span: Closes this context and flushes its content so that it can be rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦關閉，則無法修改內容。Once closed, the context cannot be modified. 必須先關閉內容，可以轉譯其內容。The context must be closed before its content can be rendered.

exception.span: 這個內容 (Context) 已經關閉或已經過處置。

span.span: This context has already been closed or disposed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的第一個點`points`指定第一個控制點，下一步 指定第二個控制點，第三個點指定的結束點的下一個點指定下一個曲線，並依此類推的第一個控制點。The first point in `points` specifies the first control point, the next specifies the second control point, the third point specifies the end point, the next point specifies the first control point of the next curve, and so on. 此方法會使用上一個區段的結束點做為起點。This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point. 如果這是在圖形中的第一個區段，它會使用指定的點方法為其開始點。If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the method as its start point. span.span: to make the segment stroked when a is used to render the segment; otherwise, .

param.name: isSmoothJoin
param.span: 使用 畫底線時，將這個區段和前一個區段之間的這個聯結視為邊角，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to treat the join between this segment and the previous segment as a corner when stroked with a ; otherwise, .
Draws a quadratic Bezier curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於三次方貝茲曲線，會使用兩個控制點，二次方的三次方貝茲曲線會使用單一控制點。Unlike a cubic Bezier curve, which uses two control points, a quadratic cubic Bezier curve uses a single control point. 此方法會使用上一個區段的結束點做為起點。This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point. 如果這是在圖形中的第一個區段，它會使用指定的點方法為其開始點。If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the method as its start point. A無法序列化，如果它包含或任何非圖案或直線線段。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何繪製二次方的貝茲曲線使用方法。The following example shows how to draw a quadratic Bezier curve using the method. [!code-csharp[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#StreamGeometryQuadraticBezierToExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/StreamGeometryQuadraticBezierToExample.cs#streamgeometryquadraticbeziertoexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#StreamGeometryQuadraticBezierToExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/streamgeometryquadraticbeziertoexample.vb#streamgeometryquadraticbeziertoexamplewholepage)]

exception.span: 未先呼叫 方法以開始圖形，即嘗試新增區段。

span.span: An attempt was made to add a segment without starting a figure by calling the method.

summary.span: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

span.span: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
